metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: You Have Learned HTML, Now What?
HTML Summary
This tutorial has taught you how to use HTML to create your own web site.
content.html: This tutorial has taught you how to use HTML to create your own web site.

content.text: HTML is the universal markup language for the Web. HTML lets you format text, add graphics, create links, input forms, frames and tables, etc., and save it all in a text file that any browser can read and display.
content.html: HTML is the universal markup language for the Web. HTML lets you format text, add graphics, create links, input forms, frames and tables, etc., and save it all in a text file that any browser can read and display.

content.text: For more information on HTML, please take a look at our HTML examples and our HTML reference .
content.html: For more information on HTML, please take a look at our HTML examples and our HTML reference.

content.text: You can also test your HTML skills with HTML Exercises and HTML Quizzes .
content.html: You can also test your HTML skills with HTML Exercises and HTML Quizzes.

content.text: Now You Know HTML, What's Next?
Learn CSS
CSS lets you style your HTML pages.
content.html: CSS lets you style your HTML pages.

content.text: CSS gives you total control of the layout, without messing up the document content.
content.html: CSS gives you total control of the layout, without messing up the document content.

content.text: To learn more about CSS, please visit our CSS tutorial .
content.html: To learn more about CSS, please visit our CSS tutorial.

content.text: Learn JavaScript
JavaScript makes your website more dynamic. A dynamic website can react to events and allow user interaction.
content.html: JavaScript makes your website more dynamic. A dynamic website can react to events and allow user interaction.

content.text: JavaScript is the most popular scripting language on the internet and it works with all major browsers.
content.html: JavaScript is the most popular scripting language on the internet and it works with all major browsers.

content.text: If you want to learn more about JavaScript, please visit our JavaScript tutorial .
content.html: If you want to learn more about JavaScript, please visit our JavaScript tutorial.

content.text: Publishing Your Website
To make your website available to the world, you must publish it.
content.html: To make your website available to the world, you must publish it.

content.text: For this, you have two options:
Using an Internet Service Provider
An Internet service provider (ISP) is a company that provides services for accessing and using the Internet.
content.html: An Internet service provider (ISP) is a company that provides services for accessing and using the Internet.

content.text: Internet services typically provided by ISPs include Internet access, Internet transit, domain name registration, web hosting, Usenet service, and colocation.
content.html: Internet services typically provided by ISPs include Internet access, Internet transit, domain name registration, web hosting, Usenet service, and colocation.

content.text: Using an Internet Service Provider (ISP) is the most common option.
content.html: Using an Internet Service Provider (ISP) is the most common option.

content.text: Advantages:
Things to Consider:
Hosting Your Own Website
Hosting your own website, on your own server, is also an option.
content.html: Hosting your own website, on your own server, is also an option.

content.text: Things to Consider:
Kickstart your career
Get certified by completing the HTML course
content.html: Get certified by completing the HTML course
